page.title: 06MAY DAY CELEBRATION -EVENTS
page.content: On May day people come to watch{ {Morris men}and {women}dance.There are about{9 women}dancing and some playing instruments while some watch and clap their hands.The{Morris Women wear {clogs,frilly skirts,bonnets and carry {arches with flowers.}Outsite there are people selling hot dogs and on the other side of the road there are stalls selling cake's and jars of things.There are games,like getting the hoop over a tin with a sweet on top.Of course you had pay{5p}but you could win a sweet.The Brownies dance round the May pole and do double plaiting,single plaiting and spiders web.Someone out of the Brownies is the May Queen.The May Queen has a crown of flowers all woven together.Sometime's there is a fun run,where there are trophys and shields to be won by the different age groups takeing part.
